name: Mark M.
position: Fullstack Developer | Node.JS, Express.JS, PostgreSQL, React/Next.js
about: Backend-focused full-stack developer specializing in Node.js applications that scale. Currently shipped: Lingput.dev - AI-Powered Language Learning Platform üöÄ RECENT WINS: - Reduced application load time from 600 ms to 85 ms (-85.8%) by implementing caching for frequent database queries. - Resolved UI blocking issue during long-running story generation (~30s) by implementing a background job queue with BullMQ + Redis and streaming real-time progress updates to the frontend. - Developed automated CI/CD pipeline, reducing deployment time from 25 minutes to 5 minutes through full automation. - Eliminated 1.3s request latency during accessToken refresh by migrating session management from relational DB to Redis. - Architected clean, testable backend with layered architecture (Controller/Service/Repository) and dependency injection SPECIALIZING IN: Building backend systems that don't break under pressure ‚Äî API design, database optimization, caching strategies, job queues, containerization, and production deployments. TECHNICAL SKILLS - Backend: Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Redis, BullMQ, GraphQL, MongoDB, Socket.io - AI/ML: OpenAI Agents SDK, CrewAI, LangGraph, MCP, OpenAI API, Anthropic API - Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Astro - Cloud & DevOps, Tools: AWS, EC2, S3, Lambda, DO Docker, NGINX, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Git, Jest - Architecture: System Design, Microservices, Caching, Database Optimization, API Design üìç San Jose, CA | üåç 25 countries explored | üõ†Ô∏è Always building something My personal website: https://markmdev.com/ üíº Open to backend developer and full-stack developer roles ‚Äî let's connect!

experience.title: Lingput ‚Äî Full-Stack Developer (Personal Project)
experience.description:
Lingput - AI-Powered Language Learning Platform

Production-grade web application delivering personalized AI-generated stories for language learners


üéØ Impact & Performance

- Eliminated slow page loads - reduced response times from 600ms to 85ms by implementing Redis caching to minimize database queries

- Transformed blocking UX - moved 30-second story generation process to background jobs with real-time progress updates using BullMQ

- Streamlined deployment pipeline - reduced release cycle from 25 minutes to 5 minutes with zero deployment failures


‚ö° Technical Architecture


Backend: Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM with dependency injection for scalability

Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS for responsive user experience

Infrastructure: Docker containerization, NGINX reverse proxy, Redis + BullMQ job processing

DevOps: GitHub Actions CI/CD, automated testing, AWS/DigitalOcean deployment


üîß Key Engineering Solutions


Async job queue system - handles compute-intensive AI story generation without blocking user requests

Intelligent caching layer - dramatically improved response times for frequently accessed content

Clean architecture patterns - implemented dependency injection enabling comprehensive unit testing

Full containerization - standardized development environment setup


üöÄ Live Production


Demo: https://lingput.dev

Code: https://github.com/markmdev/lingput
